name: part_008
file: tmp_【3D Debut】Watch the way I move~ #3DemonDebut #holoadvent [2Nob6f5dy7c]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: A roleplay skit involving Mori Calliope, Houshou Marine, and Nerissa Ravencroft, acting out a dramatic story about a banana-related crime and forbidden love.
MC segment where the girls celebrate the skit's conclusion and transition to the recording booth for their song performance.

subtitles.original: Didn't see that one coming. Hehehe.
subtitles.english: Didn't see that one coming. Hehehe.

subtitles.original: Marine also wanted an adventure,
subtitles.english: Marine also wanted an adventure,

subtitles.original: but he said no, so banana's...
subtitles.english: but he said no, so banana's...

subtitles.original: Uh, that's... huh. Wasn't expecting that.
subtitles.english: Uh, that's... huh. Wasn't expecting that.

subtitles.original: Unfortunately, that means that you, a human, meddled in matters of life and death.
subtitles.english: Unfortunately, that means that you, a human, meddled in matters of life and death.

subtitles.original: However, after that night you... uh, helped me catch that escaped soul a few weeks back,
subtitles.english: However, after that night you... uh, helped me catch that escaped soul a few weeks back,

subtitles.original: I haven't been able to stop thinking about you.
subtitles.english: I haven't been able to stop thinking about you.

subtitles.original: It looks like you've already won the heart of the Grim Reaper, so consider yourself lucky.
subtitles.english: It looks like you've already won the heart of the Grim Reaper, so consider yourself lucky.

subtitles.original: Oh, that night?!
subtitles.english: Oh, that night?!

subtitles.original: Night? Don't you dare!
subtitles.english: Night? Don't you dare!

subtitles.original: I will protect this woman from her own crimes even in death.
subtitles.english: I will protect this woman from her own crimes even in death.

subtitles.original: No one else has to know that she was the one who took the life of her lover.
subtitles.english: No one else has to know that she was the one who took the life of her lover.

subtitles.original: It can all just be an unfortunate accident.
subtitles.english: It can all just be an unfortunate accident.

subtitles.original: Banana peels are known to be slippery.
subtitles.english: Banana peels are known to be slippery.

subtitles.original: Calliope!!
subtitles.english: Calliope!!

subtitles.original: No!! She'll never be able to escape the Reaper's clutches and I can't allow that to happen.
subtitles.english: No!! She'll never be able to escape the Reaper's clutches and I can't allow that to happen.

subtitles.original: After all, this is your fault, Mori, for even letting her take this deal in the first place.
subtitles.english: After all, this is your fault, Mori, for even letting her take this deal in the first place.

subtitles.original: But the banana...
subtitles.english: But the banana...

subtitles.original: Mori's doing. It's her fault. Her fault. Ah!
subtitles.english: Mori's doing. It's her fault. Her fault. Ah!

subtitles.original: Come, Marine... If you come with me, I can protect you from even death itself.
subtitles.english: Come, Marine... If you come with me, I can protect you from even death itself.

subtitles.original: She can't get you in the realm of the immortal.
subtitles.english: She can't get you in the realm of the immortal.

subtitles.original: You absolute...!
subtitles.english: You absolute...!

subtitles.original: But...
subtitles.english: But...

subtitles.original: Shut up.
subtitles.english: Shut up.

subtitles.original: You'll be known as the goddess who protected the banana bandit!
subtitles.english: You'll be known as the goddess who protected the banana bandit!

subtitles.original: The others won't be very happy with you.
subtitles.english: The others won't be very happy with you.

subtitles.original: And you think that matters to me? Why?
subtitles.english: And you think that matters to me? Why?

subtitles.original: Banana...?
subtitles.english: Banana...?

subtitles.original: They'll blame it on her, of course!
subtitles.english: They'll blame it on her, of course!

subtitles.original: No, the best course of action is for me to take her, to protect her.
subtitles.english: No, the best course of action is for me to take her, to protect her.

subtitles.original: Enough talk. Think fast, Nerissa!
subtitles.english: Enough talk. Think fast, Nerissa!

subtitles.original: Innocent!!
subtitles.english: Innocent!!

subtitles.original: Wait! Just a minute!
subtitles.english: Wait! Just a minute!

subtitles.original: Otsu-Karaba-ou!
subtitles.english: Otsu-Karaba-ou!

subtitles.original: Thank you! Thank you! Thank you everyone!
subtitles.english: Thank you! Thank you! Thank you everyone!

subtitles.original: And, good news girls! It seems like the music team is already for us,
subtitles.english: And, good news girls! It seems like the music team is already for us,

subtitles.original: so why don't we head over and show them our super cool song performance.
subtitles.english: so why don't we head over and show them our super cool song performance.

subtitles.original: Let's do it!
subtitles.english: Let's do it!

subtitles.original: Let's go!
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: Let's go!
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: Whoa, cool place you got.
subtitles.english: Whoa, cool place you got.

subtitles.original: Thank you.
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: 荒れ狂う季節の中を 二人きり さらり
subtitles.english: Through the wild seasons, just the two of us, so casually.

subtitles.original: 明けてゆく夕日の中を 今夜も さらり さらり
subtitles.english: Through the fading sunset, tonight as well, so casually, so casually.

subtitles.original: どれほど打ち果てようと 最後には笑いたい
subtitles.english: No matter how beaten down I get, I want to laugh at the end.

subtitles.original: 何のために戦おうとも 時は愛以外
subtitles.english: No matter what I'm fighting for, time is nothing but love.

subtitles.original: 新しい日々は探さずとも 常にここに
subtitles.english: New days are always here, even if I don't look for them.

subtitles.original: 色々見てきたけれど この瞳は永遠に きらり
subtitles.english: I've seen many things, but these eyes will forever shine.

subtitles.original: あれほど生きてきたけど 全ては夢みたい
subtitles.english: I've lived so long, but everything seems like a dream.

subtitles.original: あれもこれも魅力的でも 私は君がいい
subtitles.english: Even if this and that are charming, I'd rather have you.

subtitles.original: どこにいたの 探してたよ 連れてって 連れてって
subtitles.english: Where were you? I was looking for you. Take me away, take me away.

subtitles.original: 何もかも捨ててゆくよ どこまでも どこまでも
subtitles.english: I'll throw everything away. Anywhere, anywhere.

subtitles.original: 荒れ狂う季節の中を 群衆の中を
subtitles.english: Through the wild seasons, through the crowds...

subtitles.original: 君とならば さらり さらり
subtitles.english: If I'm with you, it's so casual, so casual.

subtitles.original: 新しい日々も捨てたもんじゃないね 全てがきらり
subtitles.english: New days aren't so bad either, everything is shining.

subtitles.original: 失くしてしまったものを 振り返って ほろり
subtitles.english: Looking back at the things I've lost, a tear falls.

subtitles.original: 時には途方に暮れて ただ風に吹かれて ゆらり
subtitles.english: Sometimes I'm at a loss, just swaying in the wind.

subtitles.original: 行き先は聞いたの 行き先は決めたの
subtitles.english: I asked for the destination, I decided on the destination.

subtitles.original: 迷わずに行きたいけど しょうがないよね
subtitles.english: I want to go without hesitation, but it can't be helped, right?

subtitles.original: 何かが分かったようで 何も分かってなくて
subtitles.english: It seems like I've understood something, but I haven't understood anything.

subtitles.original: だけどそれが分かって 本当に良かった
subtitles.english: But knowing that makes me really glad.

subtitles.original: 新しい日々は探さずとも 常にここに ここに ここに ここに
subtitles.english: New days are always here, even if I don't look for them, here, here, here...
